level.heading: CHANGE OF BASE YEAR FOR HOSPITAL FOR SICK CHILDREN (ยง 29-971)

level.text: Beginning one day after the effective date of these rules, the Hospital for Sick Children’s Medicaid payment for inpatient hospital services is based upon the hospital’s audited allowable cost per diem for the base year period defined as the hospital’s fiscal year ending December 31, 1998.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 2333, 2340 (April 17, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 3487 (April 12, 2002).
